txt.en: Throne of the Dread Terror: Short Fuse

Like his brother, Thrúgrath, Rakothas's rage cannot be contained. If he is defeated without many attempts to temper his wrath, he shall be shamed in defeat.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This deed can only be completed on Tier 2 of the Throne of the Dread Terror raid.</rgb>
